title: Rounded Grotesque in New York Magazine
content:
Any advice would be greatly appreciated.

Sorry for the god awful photo!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080106145904im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_0862_5831.jpg)

 [‹ Do you think YULE know this one?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080106145904/http:/typophile.com/node/40580 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help with a pseudo-deco font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080106145904/http:/typophile.com/node/40574 "Go to next forum topic")
author: malbright

comments.content:
It’s the long extinct Elderkin. Lots of alternatives offered by Typophiles.

[http://www.typophile.com/node/39920](http://web.archive.org/web/20080106145904/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39920 "http://www.typophile.com/node/39920")
Elderkin Of course! Thanks Angel and Ken!
I wonder why it was retired... looks good to me :-)
